name: Courtney
text: So many beautiful plants it's hard to pick just one. I saw vegetables, colorful flowers, and more. Definitely stop by, enjoy the scenery while you shop. Abbott Team was knowledgeable, helpful and friendly!

name: Jason Koehn
text: Great place to buy plants. They have all kinds. Super friendly people. I love stopping in

name: Cindy Beets
text: Nice variety of plants. Good service. Will be back.

name: Shanna Bartlett
text: Wonderful experience!! Staff was amazing and so patient with this novice!! Will definitely be back!!

name: SHARON DUNN
text:
Didn't get her name, but she took her time and explained every question we had. And helped pick out beautiful healthy plants for mom.
Love this place, they have every kind of plant you can imagine ❤

name: paula lozenski
text: I love this place they have so many different plants to choose from and I have had such good luck with all that I have bought. The people are very helpful and will give you ideas and they know what to show you if you tell them what you are looking for. Almost every plant in my gardens are from here and are doing very well. If I was able to post pics on this review I could show y’all. I won’t shop anywhere but here for my plants, trees, shrubs, grasses, annuals and perennials. I am one very happy shopper. 💚🌺🌸🌼🌻🌹🌷💐

name: Susan Avery
text: Love me some Abbott’s nursery! ❤️ They are so kind, helpful and knowledgeable about their massive stock!!  I’m going there again today!!!

name: tara sealy
text: Great service. HUGE plant selection and amazing prices!!

name: Michelle Dingler
text: The staff is incredibly knowledgeable and very helpful.  And the prices are great!

name: Sue Weaver
text: Abbott's has a huge selection of just about everything for gardens, landscaping, and indoor and outdoor plants and veggies! Soon, my new lawn will have TREES!!!

name: Technical 19D
text: Absolutely terrific! The prices beat the pants off of the hardware stores, everything grown locally. Extremely helpful and knowledgeable owners.

name: Elaine Roussos
text: Healthy plants, knowledgeable and helpful, lots of plants from which to choose, price is right

name: Stacey Shows
text:
When you visit the nursery you are treated as family. I've had the pleasure of working with and knowing them for 30 years. They are very hard working and there will never be a question of their integrity. Their nursery is from hard work and being a close  knit family pays off!!!
They are outstanding!!!

name: Linda Schwemin
text: Excellent selection and very reasonable prices!

name: Vicki Hughes
text: One of my favorite places! The staff is helpful and knowledgeable, selection is excellent and prices super reasonable! I now have a flower addiction 😊

name: Tanszy Bailey
text: Fantastic selection and great prices

name: Laureatta Walker
text: Always helpful and knowledgeable

name: Christy Elrod
text: Great place . Employees were more than happy to answer my questions on different plants. Definate recommend !!!!!

name: Gary hornickel
text: Always a pleasure to visit and tour their new plants. Very knowledgeable.

name: Ken Cooper
text: This place is so good it is unreal. Absolutely one of the best, if not the best, nursery I have come across. Great prices, awesome selection, the staff really enjoys working with the customer and they are very knowledgeable. I have no relationship with Abbot’s, just a very satisfied customer. I live about 20 miles from them but will back on a regular basis.

name: Jane Maxwell
text: Beautiful selection of A quality plants.  Wide selection.  Lots of tropicals

name: buttanical // amber
text: love this place, been several times & the people are always kind & we can always find something awesome & pretty!

name: Lundy Wilder
text: Today we found all the more unusual plants on my shopping list. Of course they have the well known varieties, but they seem to be the only source around for some of the "pass along' plants of yesteryear. Also NO SALES TAX since they grow their own plants. Great prices too on things in big pots. I expected to  have to pay more !

name: Kathy Whipple
text: Tonya was extremely helpful and thorough helping me with ideas. Now July, nobody else has even close to the color that Abbott's has put on! Their variety is off the charts and their plants are very healthy, happy specimens. I will be returning.

name: Liz Bainbridge
text: Great place I found last year & the couple are so nice,friendly & knowledgeable. GREAT prices for the quality of plants~far better than any of the chain stores up town...plus they load your car...Great customer service is a bonus that you don't get anywhere else like Lowe's,Home Depot...if I could do 10 stars I would have;~}

name: Joshua Hendrix
text: My family and I have bought hundreds of plants from Abbott’s. You get a much larger variety of trees and plants here. Not to mention the staff that work there and the owners are great and extremely knowledgeable without being overbearing. The prices can’t be beat anywhere locally that’s for sure!

name: Brenda Blair
text: So many beautiful healthy plants, shrubs,  and trees!

name: Ruth Geraci
text: Wonderfully stocked greenhouse with knowledgeable and friendly people thereto help. Prices are quite reasonable for very healthy plants. Love this place!

name: Jerel Devor
text: Best service I have ever had at a nursery. Tonya is clearly an expert and enjoys helping customers find what they're looking for, even it means suggesting going to a competitor.

name: d Busch
text: Whoever says customer service is dead has not been to Abbott’s Green House. There is no need to buy your plants from a big box store ever again. Great selection. Bring lots of cash. Stick it to the man, no taxes!!

name: chuck chavis
text: Steve is the best. Very knowledge and a great guy. I would recommend this nursery to everyone.

name: Hong Nguyen
text: Great selection and very knowledgeable staff!

name: Lori Seaborg
text: Wish we would have known about this place sooner! Prices are great and the selection is broad. All plants that will do well on our Coast.

name: country girl
text: Healthy plants bought last spring still growing, great selection, customer service A+

name: Janet Mckenzie
text: Beautiful plants and friendly staff.

name: Robert mills
text: Nice place

name: Randall Allen
text: Very helpful, reasonable prices good variety

name: Doug Corporaal
text: Love the variety and prices. Staff is very helpful

name: Tracey Long
text: It's a wonderful nursery. Beautiful flowers and very friendly people.

name: dicky barganier
text: Very knowledgeable and healthy plants but the bird is not for sale!

name: Chip Dalton
text: Beautiful plants at a great price, and an excellent staff!

name: Rc Ussery
text: Good quality plants very good people

name: Marilyn Wininger
text: Very helpful.  Beautiful plants.

name: Donna Greene
text: Fabulous place!

name: Timothy Abbott
text:
(Translated by Google) Very good place to find a wide variety of ornamental plants. With a family atmosphere and personally attended by its owner.

(Original)
Muy acertado lugar para encontrar Gran variedad de plantas de ornato. Con ambiente familiar y atendido personalmente por su propetario.

name: Adam Harper, Realtor EXP Realty LLC
text: If Diane could get Donnie to get up and do a little work.....

name: Jim Mounier
text: Would  not do business with these people  they expected a offer from marketplace  on a building. Tried calling them  all morning  drove up from  Birmingham  get there  they already sold it  we really was not upset at that   They we’re just rude  when we asked about  it  just short and hateful   We will do business somewhere else

resp.text:
Sir, we are sorry that you feel we run a bad business. The ad said first come, first serve. So yes, we did say that the first one to come in with the deposit, got it. Our business hours are posted on Facebook and Google. The only days we are not in the office is on Saturday afternoon/evening to Sunday. We do try to spend those days with family and "leave work, at work". We are sorry this has upset you enough to leave a bad review, but we are more than happy to keep an eye out for another repo for you in the future.  Please understand that if we held everything for someone that simply asked how to pay a deposit, we wouldn't sell much, because people do not always show up when they say they will. Again, if you would like us to be on the look out for another repo, please let us know.

Have a great day!

name: Sue Doss
text: Haley is awesome

name: RONALD LEVERETT
text: Nice place

name: Jacqueline
text: Teresa is very knowledgeable about the plants!! She is very helpful and friendly! It makes wanting to come back and visit and buy things more often! The gift shop has so many unique gifts! So many different candle scents!!

name: Alan McCrispin
text: Super nice with som very interesting nick-nacks

name: Jeanne Wonders
text: Amazing Place! Great Quality plants, soil & variety of gifts

name: Teresa Morgan
text: Fun place to go to find plants.

name: Heather Curfman
text: I called Frog Hollow today to ask if they sold compost, though they didn't have what I needed I got something better...expert gardening advice. They answered all my questions and gave me great information about my soil needs. I will be a customer for life!

name: Ingrid Briscoe
text: Love  Frog Hollow.  Teresa is great and knows so much about all the plants and has a great gift shop. Will definitely go back.

name: Cathy Hales
text: Lovely, clever decorative items that I haven't seen in other garden shops. The owner is kind, gracious and knowledgeable. Thank goodness Google Maps knew how to get there. It was easier coming from Guntersville than Arab.

name: Karen Conn
text: So many beautiful items to choose from.  Gifts for all ages.  Great jams, jellies, pickles and ciders.  Teresa also has a huge selection of scented candles.

name: Ashllie Ramirez
text: Professional caring customer service, Haley made sure I selected the best building to fit my needs. Delivery was quick and easy. The delivery men were very kind and sure to level the building and place it where I wanted. They have such a wide variety to choose from to fit everyone's needs. I was able to customize my building to my liking. Haley was honest and took time to look around with me. I spent nearly 4 hours here trying to make a decision on all their selection. Would recommend to anyone in search of a good quality building and great customer service.

resp.text: Thank you so very much Ashllie!! I do my best to make sure every customer will love their building!! Hope you’re doing well!

name: Becca A. Ali
text: Gorgeous buildings and very good prices, hailey is the absolute best ! 5 stars !!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business and review!! We are so happy you love your buildings!

name: Kristen Smith
text: If you ever get behind in a payment due to an illness or whatever the reason they will make payment arrangements with you to catch it up then after you’ve paid them still come get your building. 10/10 do not recommend if you are looking for someone to trust and honesty  is important to you.

resp.text:
I am very sorry to hear this! Unfortunately, I can't control the financing company policies. I do know that you have so many days after a payment is due to make it up, most of our companies do let you get a few months behind before repossessing the item.
I hate that you are displeased with our business, but there isn't anything I can do about the financing companies, but I do not believe we have ever repossessed anything that was paid for!!

name: Richard Groover
text: Prices are UNBEATABLE!

name: Brittany Clayton
text: So many different choices for plants and they all looked beautiful! The owner was friendly and helpful with advice about what to get and loaded the plants in my car. Her prices were really good too!

resp.text: Thank you Brittany!!  We think our customers are 5 star too!

name: Melissa Ward
text: I loved the way the owners had so many variety of plants. I liked the way they had plants that were different from what you would find at other plant stores. The workers are very helpful and answered my questions.

name: Connie Maner
text: Well stocked, good prices and friendly service.

name: Carol Murphy
text: Wonderful people with amazing selections ! They are so caring and helpful. The quality and selection was above and beyond! First time to buy from them and won’t be the last! I will be back soon! Thank you for a wonderful experience!

name: Jennifer Blankenship
text: Bought the prettiest hanging baskets and plant stands. Great prices.

name: Beau Hudgins
text: Wonderful place and wonderful people. We stayed and talked a long time after we bought some plants we loved.  Great prices as well.  As a person who loves plants, I was very happy to learn that the folks here are even more passionate. They save plants that need it and bring them back to looking beautiful. So much to choose from as well. Even had plants I you don't see at your average nursery. All at very good prices. Will be going back. Thank you to Robin and Kathy for your time and sharing your knowledge and stories.

resp.text: Thank you Bo! We think our customers are 5 star too!!!

name: Katie Day
text: Wonderful business & people!!

name: Tim Locke
text: They have lots of landscape knowledge,very helpful,and good prices. Good People!!

name: Ruth Bradford
text: This visit as always was pleasure with helpful, knowledgable and gracious people with a great assortment and variety of plants.

resp.text: Thank you Ruth, we think our customers are 5 star too!

name: Tammie Bailey
text: Great hard working people and they know what their doing!

name: Micah Rice
text: Great folks. Helpful and honest.

resp.text: Thank you Micah!  We think our customers are 5 star too!!

name: Michelle Beeler
text: Very friendly and knowledgeable!

name: Bege Culbreath Graham
text: Great selection!

name: Desminique Rowell
text: I love this place!!!! I go flower crazy when I am there!!!
